short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aura - a salon known for beautiful hair and makeup for clients and T.V. and film in North Carolina.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install this plugin to get easy access to Aura's booking tool. See the most current stylings and makeup being created in the salon and on set. Keep tabs on what Meghan is up to with her Special FX makeup. This plugin adds a simple button to the top of your browser for quick access.
